plot: Personal experiences and social issues shape the lyrics of the Adam Ezra Group's music. This documentary film follows the lives of these five musicians who strive to make meaningful music while struggling to make ends meet.
title: Keepin On: A Film About the Adam Ezra Group
plot_es: Personal experiences and social issues shape the lyrics of the Adam Ezra Group's music. This documentary film follows the lives of these five musicians who strive to make meaningful music while struggling to make ends meet.
original_name: Keepin On: A Film About the Adam Ezra Group
plot_en: Personal experiences and social issues shape the lyrics of the Adam Ezra Group's music. This documentary film follows the lives of these five musicians who strive to make meaningful music while struggling to make ends meet.
